1.title: The Birthplace of Bigfoot

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: This episode explores the history behind the "Bigfoot" moniker as we know it today, sites such as Bluff Creek and Willow Creek that gained notoriety as a result, as well as sightings in the area and the ongoing investigation of the Patterson-Gimlin film site.

2.title: Vermont Sasquatch Witness Dax Rushlow

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: This witness interview segment features Vermont witness Dax Rushlow recalling his two Sasquatch encounters over the years.

3.title: Shyman of the White Mountains

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: A researcher of Native American extraction in New Hampshire's White Mountains shares his experiences and evidence of what he believes are Bigfoot like creatures, known as Shymen, living deep in the woods of Northern New England.

4.title: Searching for Connecticut's Wildman

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: This episode features an interview with researcher Chris Billingsgate and his search for Sasquatch in the state of Connecticut.

5.title: Feat. Dallas & Wayne

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: This episode features the notable Ohio Bigfooting hunting duo of Dallas Gillbert and Wayne Burton. Much of their research has been in an area dubbed the "Boneyard" in Wayne National Forest in Southern Ohio. Dallas and Wayne share some of their experiences in the area and some of their techniques such as calling and wood knocking.

6.title: Colorado Sasquatch Witness Jason Frank

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot:

7.title: Bigfoot in the Bridgewater Triangle

episode of.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: The infamous area of Massachusetts known as the "Bridgewater Triangle" has long been a hub of strange paranormal activity, including sightings of a Bigfoot like creature deep within it's swamps. Witness and researcher Joseph Deandrade recounts his encounters and some of the strange tales he has heard about people encountering Bigfoot in the Bridgewater Triangle.

imdb.plot outline: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows is a documentary series dealing with the rather infamous subject of Sasquatch, Bigfoot, Yeti or whatever other cultural names exist for mystery hominids seen around the world. Episodes cover important places and events in the world of Bigfoot, as well as interviews with witnesses, researchers and skeptics alike. The aim is to produce informative, entertaining and open-minded documentaries about a subject seldom taken seriously by the media.
imdb.title: Sasquatch: Out of the Shadows

Episodes cover important places and events in the world of Bigfoot, as well as interviews with witnesses, researchers and skeptics alike. The aim is to produce informative, entertaining and open-minded documentaries about a subject seldom taken seriously by the media.
